replicas.description: Number of Cassandra nodes in this datacenter

parked.description: Park the datacenter by setting sts to zero replica, but keep PVC and replica unchanged.

autoScaleMode.description: How the operator decide to spawn a new Elassandra node

podsAffinityPolicy.description: Elassandra pods affinity policy with respect to the failure-domain.beta.kubernetes.io/zone label

serviceAccount.description: ServiceAccount used by the operator to deploy pods, unless overwritten by podTemplate

decommissionPolicy.description: Decomission policy control PVC when node removed

userConfigMapVolumeSource.description: Name of an optional config map that contains cassandra configuration in the form of yaml fragments

userSecretVolumeSource.description: Name of an optional secret that contains cassandra related secrets

port.description: Prometheus agent listen port, default is 9500

root.description: Unique root used to publish DNS names for elassandra seed nodes in the form cassandra-{root}-{idx}.{domain}

jdbPort.description: Java debugger port, default is disabled

role.description: CQL Role name, may be null

superuser.description: CQL role is superuser, default is false

login.description: CQL role is authorized to login, default is true

secretName.description: K8s secret name for the role password

secretKey.description: K8s secret key for the role password

loadBalancerEnabled.description: Create a Load balancer service with external IP for Elasticsearch, default is false

loadBalancerIp.description: Add a LoadBalancer exposing CQL and elasticsearch HTTP nodePorts

ssl.description: Enable TLS for Elasticsearch transport connections

aaa.description: Enable Elasticsearch Authentication, Authorization and Accounting

replicas.description: Number of kibana instance, default is 1

webHookUrl.description: Elassandra webhook URL called when the datacenter is reconcilied
